object_prompts: Its tail is replaced with a curved banana peel.
The torso is wrapped in banana skin like armor.
Its back features a banana-shaped growth fused into the spine.
The banana forms a helmet-like crown on its head.
Banana slices hover around its chest like floating shields.
background_prompts: Floating jungle ruins overrun by banana vines and cracked stone monkey statues.

A porcelain jungle with vines growing through abandoned bathroom tiles.
A pizza battlefield in the middle of a monkey warzone, cheese splattered across trees.
